entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Elliot Lake
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 60%
